title: Virtual Simulation-Based Quality Improvement (QI) Leadership Competency Development Course in Science

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced Expertise in Scientific Fields and Understanding of Basic Quality Management Concepts
context.additional_context: Focuses on cultivating practical problem-solving skills in virtual environments for individuals in managerial/leadership roles

learning_goals: Learners can diagnose quality issues in scientific experiment processes with 80% accuracy in VR simulation environments
Through collaborative learning activities, learners can integrate virtual team members' opinions to derive three improvement strategies
In a psychologically safe virtual environment, learners can propose two or more QI strategies applicable to real-world tasks
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
